title: Warsongs
body: When will the playlist "Warsongs" go onto iTunes? I looked and I cant find it.

replies.body: You can already download it for free, why would you need to wait for it to get to itunes?
We are working with iTunes now and should hopefully have it [up] soon. For myself, I often buy music from iTunes as it is a matter of convenience and organization.  I say - "To each their own..."
It's up on iTunes now :) - and it is still available for free download as well.
Any chance of a lossless release?
